scenario.name: basic_uas_invite_prack_bad_rack
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:service@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-[call_number] From: <sip:uac@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:uas@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:uac@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: SIPp 100rel UAC (bad RAck) Supported: 100rel Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 0 0 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

PRACK sip:service@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-[call_number] From: [last_From] To: [last_To] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 PRACK RAck: 1 999 INVITE Contact: <sip:uac@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
